game.name: Saints Row: The Third Witches & Wieners Pack
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: For those who wish to be more than they are, there's the Witches & Weiners Pack. Now dress yourself as the best mascot in town, the Hot Dog. Just hope your enemies aren't hungry. Or sneak around and shoot people in the back as a Ninja. A halo and horns shows who's naughty or nice. Want to channel yo
